questions.question: I'm quite lively and temperamental
I don't like doing the same thing for a long time
I almost never find myself in situations that I haven't thought out beforehand
I can only work on complex tasks alone
I get into everything quickly
In any case, I act in accordance with my principles, no matter what happens
I need to be forced to make a decision
I have a great influence on others
censure quickly leads me to despondency
I can talk to others about things that depress me
I like it better if I am entertained than to entertain others myself
Basically, I don't like any kind of excitement
I can be very patient
I get so used to certain things and the course of events that any changes really hinder me
I almost don't make plans for the future, because usually everything will be different anyway
Even if the chances of success are not very high, I still strive for it
I am well-informed enough about diseases and their consequences not to miss anything at home
I can only work out on my own with difficulty
I don't know many people I would like to be friends with
I swallow any offense
I don't really care about other people
Sometimes I get a little malicious
I only quarrel with a few people
I can't have fun until midnight because I don't get enough sleep after that
I think I can easily adapt to a wide variety of living conditions
At work, I set myself only small goals in order to achieve them without fail
When I start making friends with someone, usually the initiative is on my side
It's easy to influence me
I think I often hide my mistakes from myself
I often have so many thoughts in my head that I can't find a reasonable solution
I have a hard time rejecting my decisions, even if the arguments against them prevail
Most of all I feel happy when I'm alone
I should talk more often about what I don't like
I wouldn't want to do anything significant in my life differently
It's not uncommon for me to take out my anger on someone else
I try to avoid excessive exertion in order to save my strength
I always admit my mistakes
I find it hard to find the right tone
I have a lot of thoughts and ideas
I carefully consider all the possibilities for organizing my life
I can't contain such feelings as joy and anger
I can't go to anyone with my problems without feeling afraid that in the end it will be used in some way
I am confident in my decisions
I think I often underestimate myself
I'm a good organizer
I try not to sweat, as it is easy to catch a cold
I am satisfied only with the final and thorough solution of the problem
I'm willing to take a big risk
I think I can turn my life into a holiday
I am very easily offended and insulted
I want to deal with bad news on my own
I don't always tell the truth
I don't forget injustice for quite a long time
I often get into a mess because I evaluate myself and others incorrectly
I need variety in my life so that I don't get bored
I find it very difficult to perceive new things
Sometimes I feel tired in the morning
Sometimes I have a bad mood
I don't love everyone I know
I don't like to think about my mistakes
It annoys me when people appear drunk in public places
All my habits are good and desirable
I am often told that I am insensitive
I feel like I don't have enough sense of tact
If I still had the opportunity, I would do everything completely differently in my life
When I talk somewhere, I often unintentionally cause laughter
When I receive good news, I can be overjoyed
I quickly lose patience and give up everything if there is no immediate success
I've already' dressed up in other people's clothes 'once
I always try to be accurate and correct, but sometimes I can overdo it
I rarely plan something in advance, rather I act without thinking
I can't take a cold lightly and I'm trying to get rid of it thoroughly
Basically, in order for me to feel good, someone should always be with me
I need someone to 'engage' me
Often, when making decisions, I know in advance that I will make the wrong step again
In principle, I can be satisfied with what I have become
Sometimes I like jokes that can greatly offend others
I am always friendly and balanced, even if I feel bad
Basically, I let my life run its course and don't think too much about it
When swimming, I can only stay in the water for a few minutes, as it is very easy to get supercooled
Before solving complex cases, I always need to consult with someone first
I decide on a job that seems interesting to me, even if I can't accurately assess whether I can do it
I invite friends to visit me extremely rarely
Other people have a better idea of how to spend their free time
I love being told what I have to do
I feel spiritually mature to meet the demands of life
Sometimes I want to smash everything to pieces
I can rely on my memory
I always wash my hands before eating
I can't bear to see animals suffer
I always get along well with others
Compared to other people, I need more time to complete a task
I often do a lot of things at the same time
I have a need to always control my behavior
I do a lot to prevent diseases, because you can easily get infected
Many of my friends consult me when they have problems
I'm more willing to decide for myself what to do, rather than doing what others suggest
I tend to make quick decisions
I don't immediately panic if something doesn't work out
I have already failed to keep my promise once because it has become uncomfortable and painful
I'm so engrossed in my work that taking breaks can really get in the way
I try to stick to a diet in accordance with scientific recommendations
It is very difficult for me to implement my views
When I'm angry, I sometimes do something that I later regret
I can admit my mistakes to others
I can get so excited about something that I lose control of my behavior
I like to make fun of people I actually love
I am quite easily confused and confused
I think I'm quite a calm and balanced person
I can be very persistent if I want to achieve a certain goal
I believe other people's promises
Sometimes I worry all day about some unpleasant event
I don't care what others think of me
I never know if I know enough about a given issue to make a definite decision
I've already blamed someone else once

I try to justify my decisions carefully and accurately
I can make concessions
I tend to rethink my decisions
